### read_wrf { #scahpy.components.atmos.wrf_io.read_wrf }

```python
components.atmos.wrf_io.read_wrf(
    file_paths,
    drop_vars,
    dif_hours=0,
    sign=1,
    destag=True,
    save_path=None,
)
```

Read WRF outputs, fix/standardize the time coordinate, (optionally) destagger
variables, and attach 2D lat/lon coordinates.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name       | Type        | Description                                                | Default    |
|------------|-------------|------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| file_paths | list of str | Paths to WRF NetCDF files (same domain).                   | _required_ |
| drop_vars  | list of str | Variable names to drop at open time (memory-friendly).     | _required_ |
| dif_hours  | int         | Time offset (in hours) to apply to the 'time' coordinate.  | `0`        |
| sign       | (1, -1)     | Sign of the time offset (+1 add hours, -1 subtract hours). | `1`        |
| destag     | bool        | If True, destagger U, V, W, and other *_stag variables.    | `True`     |
| save_path  | str or None | If provided, writes the resulting dataset to NetCDF.       | `None`     |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type       | Description                                                    |
|--------|------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | xr.Dataset | Merged, time-unique WRF dataset with standardized coordinates. |
